instructions.text: We now are playing a box-opening game. As an agent, your task is to keep track of logical states. We will give you initial states, several actions and you should update logical states accordingly.

As an agent, you need to find the way to go out of this quest. Currently, there are several boxes in front of you and there is a key inside each box. You can use only one of these keys to open the door and finish this quest.
